root.cn: 这是一款简单的儿童早教软件，画面流畅！玩法简单，只要猜出图片中的交通工具名字即可！屏幕上会出现各种交通工具，应有尽有。 可以大幅提高宝宝识别生活中常见的事物，同时也可以提高对汉字的学习，是妈妈们早教的好帮手！宝宝们赶快来体验吧！ 每一种交通工具有高清的图片和朗朗上口的读音。小朋友一定会很感兴趣。 快来和我们一起开始奇妙的交通工具猜图之旅吧。 为孩子们提供各种不同的交通工具. 有汽车,飞机,轮船,自行车,摩托车,火箭,火车,太阳,月亮等等。
root.en: This is a simple early childhood education software, smooth screen! Play simple, as long as you guess the name of the plant in the picture! All kinds of plants will appear on the screen. It can greatly improve the baby's recognition of common things in life, and also improve the learning of Chinese characters. It's a good helper for mothers to teach early! Let's experience it quickly! Every plant has high-definition pictures and catchy pronunciation. Children will be very interested. Come and join us on a wonderful journey of plant guessing. The plants covered are: Vegetables: cabbage, spinach, rape, cabbage, amaranth, leek, Artemisia, coriander, mustard, fennel, garlic, lettuce, cabbage, cauliflower, broccoli, oatmeal, cabbage, shallot, radish, radish, potato, lotus root, sweet potato, yam, taro, taro, arrowhead, onion, ginger, garlic, garlic, leek, leek, winter melon, pumpkin, squash, cucumber, eggplant, tomato, bitter melon, pepper Corn, pea, broad bean, lentil, four season bean, mushroom, mushroom, Flammulina mushroom, fungus, tremella, apricot, abalone, mushroom, Tricholoma Flowers: plum, peach, peony, Begonia, Magnolia, Bauhinia, forsythia, lilac, wisteria, Rhododendron, pomegranate, smiley, Magnolia, jasmine, gardenia, osmanthus, hibiscus, wintersweet, camellia, hyacinth, tulip, violet, chrysanthemum, lotus, Lycoris, Narcissus Fruits: pineapple, strawberry, Begonia, Hami melon, red date, huolongguo, pear, plum, mango, plum, papaya, lemon, apple, grape, navel orange, cucumber, hawthorn, persimmon, crystal, peach, melon, figs, black plum, melon, melon, melon, watermelon, apricot, cherry Trees: ginkgo, ginkgo, holly, privet, larch, lemon, tree, tree, tree, tree, tree, Lagerstroemia, cedar, cedar, camphor, Tilia, mulberry, peach, poplar, willow, osmanthus, Wutong, fig, maple.
